https://tmrev.io/movie/13696-Angels with Dirty Faces 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k23E4UAcow8eczLRmVCMdukL4Mx.jpg In New York, the boys Rocky Sullivan and Jerry Connelly are best friends and small time thieves. After a robbery, Rocky is arrested and sent to a reformatory school, where he begins his criminal career. Jerry escapes and later becomes a priest. After three years in prison, Rocky is released and demands the return of $100,000 deposited with his solicitor - prior to his jail term. Angels with Dirty Faces
